text: was a Japanese sprinter. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics. Okano died in Tokyo on 17 November 2020 from problems caused by a subarachnoid hemorrhage at the age of 90.岡野栄太郎さん死去 元陸上五輪代表選手、元毎日新聞社取締役 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from subarachnoid hemorrhage Category:Olympians for Japan Category:Japanese athletes Category:Sprinters
title: Eitaro Okano
